Articles.Content:
I'll admit after watching a few youtubers fail tremendously at this game and others do the unthinkable I immediately saw the potential here. It was only until a few days ago when I was able to actually play this game having bought it little over a month ago. With the aid of some friends giving me stacks upon stacks of potential mods for a rookie like me, here is my first plane and first hyper sonic jet:

And yes that is Bill after I accidentally EVA'd him >.<

Welcome!

That's one large and ambitious aircraft, kudos to you if you built it yourself. I find aircraft far more difficult than rockets/spacecraft.

I wonder what would happen if Bill went into one of those intakes...I know for sure the Kerbal dies if he puts his head into the exhaust side of an engine.
